string.text: The amount of weight you want to have returned to you based on your belt attachments.\n 1.0 = 100% of attachment weight is returned to you\n 0.5 = 50% of attachment weight is returned to you
The amount of weight you want to have returned to you based on your helmet.\n 1.0 = 100% of helmet weight is returned to you\n 0.5 = 50% of helmet weight is returned to you
